TopicTitle: Has this ever happend to any of you?

Articles.Content: I launched up KSP and noticed something odd in the background
are you running some sort of mod that changes height of the atmosphere or something? looks like those Kerbals are coming in a tad hot!
This is a bug I know of which happenes with KMP
I would like this as a new loading screen image.
Would be funny to watch them burn up on re-entry.
No, but as mentioned, it looks like you're running a multiplayer mod. Re-entry effects on stuff that isn't re-entering is a known bug with Kerbal Multi Player.
You know, in a weird way it kind of looks like the text itself is getting re-entry effects as well. Look at 'Quit'.
I'm more interested in the crab nipples actually
That's why you don't bring Ouija boards to space.
Ummm... what's the problem with this picture? It looks pretty normal to me...
That is the coolest thing I have ever seen. In the menu xD. seriously though adding more stupid/funny backdrop "Easter-eggs" to the menu would be awesome.
Dude I wish I knew what caused that but I just wanted to comment and say that is hilarious and I would like to trade loading screens.
